title: WTF REMAKE
body: They remade bc the lux rage quitted at level 1 because i cheese ganked her as twitch level 2 after a red leash. After that i rotated top and killed darius. TWO KILLS IN 3 MINUTES LITERALLY THE PERFECT TWITCH GAME. But they remade... arent you not allowed to remake after someone dies????? Unless i read it wrong? Im just so pissed bc that would have been an easy promotion. Thanks for any help <3

replies.body:
LOL "Perfect Twitch game" you probable killed 2 players that were having connectivity issues, talk about fair fight.
The remake is legit, its based on timer not kills. And it would be the decision of the other team to decide, not yours thankfully.
Also, had the darius i killed add me after and apologize for it. So before being a jerk on random comments, why dont u ask about it.
LOL Talk about being a positive comment. Leave. No one wants your opinion.
Kills don't stop remakes, they can only happen when there's someone not loaded in.
K thx. I read that somewhere? Must have read it wrong.
You did read that but they didn't implement it cuz it shouldn't matter, afk is afk, a couple kills in the beginning doesn't matter that much
Okay thanks. I understand but like that would have been a 20 minute game xd

As long as someone did not connect into a game, the option to remake will appear. Think that's how it worked, because I've seen rekmakes happen even after FB has been determined.

I mean, if I'm on the losing team and someone RQ'd because of first blood, I'd rather not want a loss because of that ragequitter. *And* additionally someone who never connected.
Maybe the Lux or their jungler dced before you did that?
The lux was fighting back. Not sure what happened.
Im prety sure kills dont stop remake if you have a player not connected.
